parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> TKOH </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the global namespace attached to the active user profile. Use [[setVariable]] and [[getVariable]] to save and load data to and from this [[Namespace]]. A variable can be deleted by setting its value to [[nil]]. By default the variables set in this namespace will exist while the game is running. In order to make variables save permanently, use [[saveProfileNamespace]] before the game is over.
The variables are stored next to the user profile in a file named ''myUsername.vars.GAMENAME'' (e.g. in the ''My Documents\Take On Helicopters'' folder). </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''profileNamespace'''</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Namespace]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_namespace = '''profileNamespace''';</code> </value></part><part><name>Example1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>'''profileNamespace''' [[setVariable]] ["var_kills",10000];
_playerKills = '''profileNamespace''' [[getVariable]] "var_kills";</code> </value></part><part><name/>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[saveProfileNamespace]], [[missionNamespace]], [[uiNamespace]], [[parsingNamespace]], [[currentNamespace]], [[localNamespace]], [[allVariables]], [[with]], [[ArmA:_Editing#Forward_Compatibility|Forward Compatibility]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
